text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(After that, the "Demon Queen Windy-chan's Castle" project 
moved along quite well for a time.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(Of course, with more people working together the likelihood of 
disagreements increases as well.)

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Eh? You want to cover it all up in a blackout curtain? I don't 
think that would look too good though. If everything is so dark, 
the classroom's walls would stand out too much.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Eeeh!! But since it's a Demon Queen Castle, it has to be all black! 
Can't we just buy more blackout curtains?

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
We might go over budget with that… even if we do, we're already 
scraping by with all the other things we're trying to do.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
But…! This is what I want! 
All the curtains have to be… they have to be all black!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… I guess we can think about it first. 
But I really think it won't work. Sigh…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Uuuu…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yo go off Demon Queen!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
You just want to make the best possible Demon 
Castle for your servants, right? What an uncompromising 
Demon Queen you are! I stan!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Ah, y-yeah that's right! 
It'll be cooler if it's like that! So…!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: And you too, you're doing some bussin Demon Army work!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Eh, m-me? Bussin Demon Army?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
It's good for a Demon Queen to hear her subordinate's 
opinions, don't you think? Also thanks for taking 
care of the budget. It's a big help!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Well, it's the role assigned to me. 
I also want to help make this a success, after all.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Yaas slay, Demon Army! If everyone's happy, then the project will succeed! 
Them's the vibes! Now, go talk about this some more.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I'm sure you'll find a compromise with this somehow. 
Basically, you want "All the walls to be black", right? What if then…

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
All black… black… AH! I've got it…! 
We used some construction paper for the castle's passageways!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Ah! There's surely a lot of black paper left!!! 
I see, we can stick that onto the walls, then…!!

text_block_list.name: Windy & Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
This will work!! 
It'll work!!

text_block_list.name: Palmer & Helios
text_block_list.text: Resolved WEI☆

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Haaaaa—…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Huh? D-Digital-san!? 
Digital-san, stay with us…!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
…Huh!? Ah, thank you, Doto-san! 
The "Yang" energy was just so precious, my body almost gave out…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
It's amazing how well they were able to diffuse 
that situation. All Digitan could do was watch 
this disagreement event from a distance.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
…I'm so thankful Palmer-san and Helios-san joined this project. 
I think that from the bottom of my heart.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
…? B-But Digital-san… 
you also work a whole lot to help this project out, don't you…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Eh? There you go again! Doto-san, you're too kind! Digitan's 
contributions aren't that big a deal.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I mean, even if that argument had happened right 
in front of me, I think it would have been too much 
for an otaku like me to give her opinion…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: B-But…

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Doto-chan! I have a question about the costumes～!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Okay! I'll be right there～…! 
….

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Phew～Good progress again today! We'll barely make it, 
but I can see it succeeding already! I'm all fired up!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ditto! I'm really excited for the day itself now. 
I'm sure everyone who goes in will have lots of fun!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
No cap. I hope Milady and Miracle come too. Ah, 
Jordan told me over LANE yesterday "Is it like scary deadass?".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
And you replied something like “Why don't you come by and catch 
these hands” I'm guessing. I don't know if you noticed, but…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Windy's kind of amazing huh.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I totes getcha fam～☆ 
I vibe hard with her type♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's it. Totes. Like, it's so refreshing to see how she is. 
She comes off as a bit selfish, but she goes in head first 
once she decides on something.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Maybe I said that a bit crudely… but I really do respect her. 
How far we've come is proof of her strength.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Because of that… so because…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ? What's up, Palmer-chi?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Uhm… say Helios.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…I feel like I need to start being selfish too, 
do you think… that's bad?
